name: Jam Filled Buns
author: Carol
summary: These little buns will disappear in a flash.
directions: In a large bowl, whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt
Cut in butter or margarine until crumbly
Make a well in the center
Beat egg until light and frothy, and mix in milk; pour all at once into well
Stir lightly to form a soft dough
Turn dough out onto a floured surface, and knead 8 to 10 times
Pat or roll out to 3/4 inch thickness
Using a round cookie cutter, push straight down to cut
Arrange well apart on a greased baking sheet
Make a deep hollow in the center of each biscuit
Drop a small spoonful of jam into each hollow
Bake in a preheated 450 degrees F (230 degrees C) oven for 12 to 15 minutes
